meanings: to be up to the task

lessons.japanese: 価格の下は３０ドルから上は５０ドルに及ぶ。
lessons.indonesian: Prices range from as low as $30 to as high as $50.

lessons.japanese: その問題は私の力の及ぶところではなかった。
lessons.indonesian: The problem was beyond my reach.

lessons.japanese: その地震で広範囲に及ぶ被害がでた。
連邦政府の予算削減は社会保障の給付に影響が及ぶでしょう。
lessons.indonesian: Federal budget cuts will take a bite out of Social Security benefits.

lessons.japanese: 彼は力の及ぶ限りその仕事をやった。
lessons.indonesian: He did the work to the best of his ability.

lessons.japanese: 彼の仕事は井戸掘りからゴミの処理にまで及ぶ。
lessons.indonesian: His tasks range from digging wells to getting rid of garbage.

lessons.japanese: 博識の点で彼に及ぶものはいない。
lessons.indonesian: No one can approach him in wideness of knowledge.

lessons.japanese: 日本の資金力は今や世界のすみずみに及ぶ。
lessons.indonesian: Japan's money power has a global reach now.

lessons.japanese: 私の力が及ぶ限り援助します。
lessons.indonesian: I'll help you to the best of my power.

lessons.japanese: 私の力が及ぶ限り援助します。
lessons.indonesian: I'll help you as much as I can.

lessons.japanese: 私の力が及ぶ限り援助します。
lessons.indonesian: I'll help you to the best of my ability.

lessons.japanese: 価格の下は３０ドルから上は５０ドルに及ぶ。
lessons.indonesian: Prices range from as low as $30 to as high as $50.

lessons.japanese: その問題は私の力の及ぶところではなかった。
lessons.indonesian: The problem was beyond my reach.

lessons.japanese: その地震で広範囲に及ぶ被害がでた。
